dosing.notes: Narrow therapeutic index. Monitor serum levels.

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: 300mg BID or 600mg QHS (use ER for better renal profile/tolerability)
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 300mg every 3-5 days. Check trough level (12 hr post-dose) after 5 days of steady dosing. Aim for >0.6.
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Can start 300mg TID or 450mg BID. Check levels on day 4/5. Adjust rapidly.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 300mg BID. Recheck level in 5-7 days. Titrate to 0.6-0.8.
canadian_clinical.max_dose_evidence: Dependent on serum level (usually 1.2 mEq/L acute)
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: Doses >1200mg/day often required for acute mania. Clinical max determined by toxicity (>1.5 mEq/L).

cautions.renal: Renally cleared. Adjust dose based on GFR. Contraindicated in severe failure.
cautions.pregnancy: Ebsteins Anomaly (first trimester risk). Monitor levels closely.
